content.detailedDescription:
This is not what everyone says they say


at 10pm last evening i sat in my recliner watching a movie about jesse james and there seemed to be a series of flashes bright white/blue flashes which caught my eye and made me think there was a squad car out front so i reached over and pulled the curtain only to see three large bright orange balls just above the tree line some 100 yards away this balls where in a straight line but diagonal from ground to sky like pointing into the woods i fourth light was seen but as i seen that the last one was gone this happened so quick and i closed my eyes thinking a plane was crashing right outside i took  a minute and called to my niece asking if she seen that she said no and i got up to go to the porch i stood out side explaining to her i just seen the strangest thing ever and we looked around the sky and woods as the path of this was towards the woods a good 5 minutes outside we heard a almost thunder like rumble off in the distance like a thunderstorm rolling in i called my sister maybe 10 minutes after the lights asking if she seen anything and she said no another 10 minutes or so i called my mother and said did you see anything before?? and she was like no i wasnt outside and went on to tell me how people seen a meteor in the sky i dont know anything about stars and metours and things of that nature but what i seen couldnt fly diagonally with out hitting the ground near by if it was falling from the sky i told my mom that what i seen had to hit the ground in the woods near my home it couldnt travel at that angle without that happening as i was telling her i seen a light at the top of the bluff of trees and i said i think someone must have a flashlight out lookin in the woods at that moment i was speechless as the light turrned a bright glowing green circle almost as if someone put a green stoplight in the woods i asked my niece if she seen it and see did she was trying to get her camara on her phone to take a pic but the light was to far away then the light seemed to change shape into lines and back to circle and started raising higher and then it was gone i was speechless and kinda freaked out my mother told me to call the police and i refused as i am not a believer in things and i dont want to be a crack pot but what i seen is real and what i seen i can not explain please help me figure out or atleast set my mind at ease on what i might have seen because a metour dosent do what happened

i am tempted to look in the woods but kinda afraid at the same time
content.summary: Flashes with 4 bright orange balls and strange events to follow

content.detailedDescription: I got in my deer hunting stand at 5:30am. the stand is 12 ft off the ground. the vegetation is 7ft high. visibility of the sky is clear 10 miles to the horizon. when the sky was turning pink in the east just before daylight, i opened the south facing window, and saw a brightly lit object hovering 100 meters off the ground, 400 meters due south. it was the size of a school bus. it had lightning blue lights spinning horizontally around the middle of a disc shaped craft. it was completely silent. after 30 seconds, it shot up 200 meters like a bullet, and stopped dead, like it had hit a wall. it hovered there for a few seconds then shot back down to the same spot it was previously. it stopped there like it had hit a brick wall and hovered. it didn't rock back and forth or drift when it hovered. it didn't move an inch. after another minute of hovering, the spinning lights slowed down and dimmed. the craft then shot off from south of me over the west horizon, which was at least 10 miles away. it took about 1 second total. the craft left a brief contrail that i can only compare to a very thin bolt of lightning. the craft changed directions a couple of times before going over the horizon, so the lightning like contrail had a couple of zig-zags in it. to be honest, the contrail could have just been my eyes playing tricks on me. but, the ufo i saw was nothing from this world. from the second i saw it the hair on my neck raised. the light itself was different from any light i had ever seen. it looked liquid and was very bright, but very crisp. it was so quiet out, i could hear field mice nesting in a bush 20 meters away. i was 20 miles from the closest road, and 40 miles from the closest town. this craft made no sound at all. when it bolted off, i should have at least heard a sonic boom as it passed the speed of sound, but i didn't. this was the weirdest, most unexplainable occurance of my 32 year life. i was actually very afraid the whole time i saw it, and have not been back to that spot since. i had a pair of zeiss binoculars around my neck the whole time i was viewing this thing, and never even thought to use them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lightning blue spinning lights on hovering disc shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was putting out the garbage and  i looked up . at first i thought the stars are in a curved pattern and i studied it for a while, thats not  your typical placement of stars. went back in to the house. a few minutes went by i went back and looked again , still there. continued to look around and seen another group of stars in that same pattern . it was four lites in a curve, also saw several small planes in the area ,more than usual. i want to know if there were any sightings in our area last nite.By the way i am 2 miles from kennedy airport. the nite sky had a lot of stars out but yet it was very cloudy.
content.summary: Lites in a curved shape in two different spots .Not your normal  star set up.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of june 22 around 2-2:30 am i was driving home after dropping off a few buddies, we were out late at a bar in huntington beach for a friends concert. i had dropped them off and continued north on my normal route home the streets were empty and i remember getting that feeling of anxiety or like when the hairs on your arms and back of your neck stand up, like something is about to take place that you would rather not have happen. i remember feeling tense because i was running into every red light although no one was on the road and i couldn't help but feel the sensation that like i was running from something or like as if i was being watched or chased. i remember feeling a small sense of relief every time i would pass another motorist or local seven-eleven, i even stopped to buy a pack of cigarettes although i had quit the month before i think i just needed the reassurance of the cash tender to make me snap out of whatever i was feeling but when i got back into my car i felt it again like an aura was surrounding me in my car. as i continued northbound i lit a cigarette at one stop sign when i saw the first flash, it was as though someone had taken a photo of the street from above, i initially shrugged it off as i was too focused on getting home. there was one more flash that seemed to be 20-30 feet ahead of my vehicle, thats when i looked up and saw what appeared like an arrow tip formation of lights changing colors, it looked as if it was traveling in the same direction as i as the tip of the arrow was pointing in my direction. at first i believed it to be a commercial aircraft or jetliner as we have many airplane traffic by john wayne airport so i tried to ignore it but i remember that the colors kept pulsating like a heart beat so i continued to follow it through my windshield. the formation was composed of perhaps 9-12 lights all at different variations of brightness, the tip was a crimson-red that pulsed to a tangerine-orange, the two rear lights were purple and would change to a light blue, and in between there were white and yellow dimly flickering lights. on this particular night i remember that the moon was not out and the sky was quite dark so i couldn't make out any solid structure they could have been attached to. i was still driving behind it waiting to see if it would fly further away or reveal a flight pattern but it would not move forward nor fall back, it was as though it was hovering at the same speed that i was traveling, and that is when i got the feeling of anxiety again except this time i felt like i was being watched. it would stay with me for about 4-5 miles and finally the leading light started to fall behind, still throbbing the same crimson pattern, it was as though it was changing formation. the white and yellow flickering lights were gone by now and the arrow was now pointing the opposite direction but continued before my vehicle until it began to travel in that direction. these lights were following me for approximately 10 minutes before they past over me, disappearing to my rear. i didn't look back or see exactly where they dissipated but i remember a terrible head ache, in fact when i finally got home and got out of my car i remember vomiting because my head hurt so bad. i wanted sleep really bad, my eyes felt like they were shutting and i couldn't control them thats when my girlfriend came to the door and found me laying in my own vomit, she asked if i was drunk but i explained to her that i had been sober for the later part of the night. i don't remember exactly what time i had arrived home but i saw the clock as i was explaining the incident to my girlfriend and the time was almost four, i remember thinking how could a twenty minute drive from my buddies house to mine prolong to an hour and a half. my girlfriend still doesn't know how long i was laying out on the front porch. this event sticks out in my memory because of the strong emotional feelings of anxiety and helplessness. i have only shared this experience with a select few including my girlfriend and they all say i should seek other witnesses to this event but i have yet to find any.
content.summary: Stars or lights in odd formation of arrow or triangle

content.detailedDescription:
One night me and my friend were walking from our tree casino to the house when we stopped to look at the stars and we noiced a very bright ring of light purple lights over my trampoline (in the right of the sky) and i had no clue at all what ever it was. we were looking at it for about a minute or two then it zoomed accross the sky, faster than i had ever seen anything move in my life, to above my garage (in the left of the sky) and made a shhoo noise then when it stopped it made a low pitched beep noise. after that we were watching to see if it was going to do n e thing else then with no noise or movement just dissapeared and we didnt see anything 4 the rest of the night and i have never seen it again.

it was freakin weird!!

the whole time i was just amazed at the whole thing but afterwards i got this weird feeling like an akwardness but it lasted only like 2 minutes then everything was back to normal.
content.summary: An exremely fast moving hen dissapearing ring of very bright light purple lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work i was traveling on mcneil rd. and i looked out of my drivers side window and noticed an object fly over my vehicle i saw the back of it  their were a total of three lights. on the right side of the craft the light was a bright white the center of the craft had a red light and the far left side also had a bright white light all lights would flash from right to left. the craft appeared to be no higher than 500 feet width was about the size of a foot ball field. i observed the craft traveling at a very low rate of speed with no audible sound. the back of the craft was flat and looked like the bottom side of a triangle completely straight. i have never witnessed any airplane like the one i saw. the color of the craft was black, if possible please have your invistagators look into the radar if you are able to do so please e-mail me the results or direct me to a site where i can research on my own.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on beaver lake rd. just east of highway 83 near chenequa, wisconsin.  we had just slowed the vehicle to allow some deer to cross the road in front of us when a green glow appeared from the north--the deer were passing from south to north so i was scanning the tree line ahead of us carefully for more deer. suddenly and rapidly, the green glow brightened and over the tops of the trees appeared a green glowing oval shaped object descending in a flat rapid trajectory.  trailing the green glowing object was a orange trail which appeared to be about 20 times the length of the object itself.  the descent continued until the object appeared to explode into about 25 orange pieces over what appeared to be the area of delafield wisconsin. i did not hear a noise or feel a blast wave. i thought the object was a meteor. another person was in the car, and we both thought is was the most unusual thing we had ever seen.  it did not appear to be very high in the sky when we saw it, and no other objects or meteors were visable as we scanned the night sky.  i did phone this into 911, and they said there were other similar reports, and no reports of missing aircraft at that time.
content.summary: Green glowing oval shape object descending from northern sky with a trailing orange glow about 20 times its length exploded into about 25 large orange pieces over delafield wisconsin.

content.detailedDescription: We'll have to get back to you its still going on
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This thing was a glowing ring or lights witch then broke up into several lights , it made passes at us moved away at high speeds takin several sharp right turns headed directly back at us stooped then moved away extreamlry fast took a sharp left turn 90

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 1015 pm while exiting i435 onto 45hwy my wife brought my attention to a slowly falling yellow object that appeared to be like a falling star but much larger and slower.  it appeared as if it was on fire.  it appeared to go from yellow to green (maybe the color change was due to obscuring of the object from clouds?)  it was a fairly clear night though???  then it went to yellow again then our vision was obscured due to the low level of the falling object behind trees then a large flash of yellow light like it exploded. (the explosion was like when a transformer blows)

we were facing north while exiting the interstate and were looking in the direction of kci airport.  it appeared to fall east of i435 and north of hwy 152.  while i cannot be certain of its distance away from us due to it being dark....  it looked like it was just west of the airport. 

911 was notified, platte county dispatch transferred the call to kc, mo 911 operator.  the operator did tell me that i was not the only person to report this that a couple of other people had called.

no photos sorry....
content.summary: Slow falling slight angle yellow fireball with explosion

content.detailedDescription: I was getting my usual photo's of ufo's per night and since this is a hot-spot for ufo's in durham..Duke st facing west and south area. i recieved my pictures after down load and found other ufo's that i would have missed if i hadn't have used a digital camera from a certain pharmacy that sell vivitar digital mini-camera's..Great for night pictures of stars and whatever else...And cvs has never pais me a penny for any coments. i just know that i have almost a camera that basically would have been a 20.00 camera..I found out in my work with robots and making them run around the room on sollar power.And noticing getting a light(s) in the dark and with all lights out. so, i thought that i could find ufo's the in  the same manner. by concentrating on the bio-illuminessant ship that they are flying. weither it be dark matter(dark light)will be on the negative segment of the wavelegnth of light from the ships or so called ufo's. or light matter or in our light spectrum which is possitive matter.( light) i , mr. d.W.Howerton, believe that and have proof that saucers exist and visits are getting more and more prevallant. i think this area is getting highly active and needs people here to videotape this to teach others what to look for and what to do in case this happens to you???
content.summary: Have never seen these kinds of ufo before?

content.detailedDescription:
April 13, 2010 - approximate 10:05pm - clear sky - moon cycle is on waning crescent - sunset was at 8pm local (us central)- the temperature was recorded at a low of 60 degrees last night, down from a high 76 degrees fahrenheit.

i was washing my truck at a car wash located on west hilderbrand ave near the crossroad of aganier ave. the car wash is located 6 miles north of downtown san antonio, texas. 

my truck (1998 dodge durango) is parked in a stall facing south. i was standing at the rear of my truck when a bright-light (ufo) was reflecting off the back window down from the stars above. i quickly turned around and tilted my head up to the bright-lighted (ufo)'s direction. my bodies position is facing due north. my left and right is parallel with the hilderbrand ave. the bright-light (ufo) continues to brighten with no sound.  

i quickly noticed that the big dipper was up and to the right of the increasingly bright-light (ufo). i stretched my right arm out and put my right hand up and was able to measured three finger width below from the lower left big dipper star (dubhe). if you follow a straight line from merak throw dubhe like your looking for the north star, this bright-light ufo was positioned about two fingers width to the left of that line. 

the bright-light ufo was about the size of the dudhe star when i first noticed it, then its size or brightness increased to about three times the size of the dudhe star. then, with no sound what so ever, it looked like it exploded. i watched as the center of the ufo turned black like space was filling it and a ring was forming from what was left of the bright-light ufo. the blackness from the center quickly filled outward and consumed the bright-light ufo until it was completely gone from view. it did not move in any direction from when i first noticed it. 

i scanned left and right, up and down to cover the general area to see if a second light might show or and falling star or debris might be falling. i scanned the stary night for approximately 2 to 4 minutes. no new subject appered. then i noted the clock on my truck was 10:14pm.
content.summary: Brightlight (ufo) then a massive star-like explosion

content.detailedDescription: I was watching golf match and a player hit a high lofted ball and as the camera panned the sky watching the golfball something entered the screen at a high rate of speed and suddenly stopped as if watching.   i think it was far away. it then left the screen   i have it recorded.
content.summary: Came onto tv screen as i watched golf.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 9:30 pm (cannot remember if it was sunday the 21st or monday the 22nd of march.)  i was out on our lawn and looking up at the sky.  i was facing west.  i noticed what, at first, i thought was an airplane. it was brighter than a normal airplane and it had only an orange glow.  

we live about 20 miles from the airport and we see planes on approach all the time (but we can hear them too.)  the light (object) was traveling what seemed to be the same flight path, at the same height and speed as an airplane on approach.  however, as it got closer, i couldn't see any of the other (blinky) lights that normally are evident on any aircraft.

as it got closer, it seemed to be higher than airplanes would normally be over our house, and it was silent!  i quickly asked my grilfriend to come outside and see it.  at that time it was directly over head and we both agreed that it was no airplane.

i observed the obeject as it passed over head and continued to the east. normally, with planes (no matter how high they are) as well as with satellites  they travel from west to east over our house and disappear over the horizon.  in this case, the object continued eastward but seemed to climb in altitude. it went higher and higher until it was too high to see any more.

i have contemplated, this event for over three weeks. i have obsevered many airplanes since the event and cannot figure out what it was that we saw that night.
content.summary: Medium-bright, orange light. moving slowly with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was at school in my sophmore math class and looked out the window facing west towards a trailer park across hwy 31 in westfield indiana and seen this triangle shaped object about 800 to 1500 feet off the ground.  i immediately im'ed my mom on fb and told her about it and she said for me to make sure it wasn't the stealth bomber.  i couldn't disrupt my class so i kept my mouth shut as everyone whould have laughed. it wasn't the stealth, it was going to slow then it was gone. i go to air shows and i have never seen anything like this except one time at night when my mom seen a triangle but i only seen the end of it going west.  this thing today was going north over hwy 31 and i was close.  i wonder if anyone else seen this.  i keep up on my aircraft cause my grandpa was a pilot in the airforce and planes really interest me. if this was one of our's, i want to fly it someday.  i make fun of my mom and this ufo stuff but today kinda made me think..
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking outside of my office and looking at the sky, which was blue with a a group of dark clouds that looked like it might shower soon. i was watching a twin propeller airplane that was very loud and not flying very high go across the sky heading in a northwestern direction. 
  as the plane was flying out of the area, a small black object caught my eye to the southeast of the plane, maybe a couple of miles back from the plane's position. the object seemed to emerge from the dark cloud formation over the area. i thought it was a bird that had flown very high because it was not making any noise like the plane or any flying object i have watched usually makes. it was heading in a northern direction, slightly different than the course the plane had taken. when i judged that the object was moving faster than the plane had been moving and was not a bird, i stopped walking and stared at it fly across the sky. the object's flight was so gracefully quick and smooth as it flew. it moved completely different than the plane had moved and with no noise emanating from an engine or propulsion that i could notice. i did not see any kind of exhaust trail and the sky was not in a condition to make contrails very easily. i watched the silent, black sphere-like object smoothly and quickly make its way across the sky, actually passing adjacently behind the same path that the plane had taken, which i could still hear and see as it flew further away. the black sphere-like object did not reflect any light as it flew overhead, nor did it have any kind of running lights on its surface that i could see. i walked along the sidewalk trying to follow the object and keep it in my line of sight. the object then gracefully arced into a lower trajectory, still heading in northern direction and i lost it as it dipped below a tree line that was across the street and went out of my view.
  i have no idea what i saw flying overhead, but i know that it was not a bird or an airplane or a jet or helicopter. i was puzzled by the experience and after i lost sight of the object, i was amazed at what i had witnessed. it was only after a couple of minutes at staring at the sky and trying to find the object again that i decided to phone my wife and tell her what i saw. i am still a bit awestruck at witnessing the ufo, and as much as i am skeptical about what i think i saw, i am inclined to believe that it was not a man-made flying object. i was so captivated and amazed at what i saw, and it happened so fast, that it did not occur to me to try and take a picture of it with my phone until after i was speaking with my wife on the phone.
content.summary: Black sphere-like object, silent and fast.

content.detailedDescription:
On april 11 noticed two stationary globes in western sky.  using binoculars
noticed globes changing colors in a fluid manner..Red,blue,yellow,orange.

then noticed a second globe to the north with same color changing activities.
watched for several minutes. on april 10 my wife and i saw them again for an extended period 15-20 minutes until we went back in.  saw again last night
(april 13)  i first noticed at 10 p.M. thru 11 p.M.  still there when i went to bed.  will view tonight at nite fall.

weather was extremly clear and mild.  other stars were plentiful but not changing colors.  if it was an atmospheric condition why did the other stars not share the color changing?
content.summary: Three color changing globes

content.detailedDescription:
I just want to know if mufon has ever heard of anything simular to this.
please respond!!!!

on i believe it was april 2nd, 8:30ish pm, me, and a bunch of friends(4 if memory serves.) were playing spot-light tag in a lightly wooded/prarie grass type area behind my neighborhood that we called "the weeds". 
we spotted a lumunous globe approx. 5ft. in diameter stream from out of the western sky until it was above a tree line the bordered a corn field ajacent to our position. we were in a very gentle rolling valley. "the weeds" making up the southern slope, & the cornfield making up the northern one. we were about 3/4 the way down our side of this valley playing when we all just kinda became aware of this thing kinda all at once. i don't remember like anybody yelling, "hey!!! look at that!!!"
i just remember we all seemed to look and see this thing all together.
   anyhow. it flew from the west until it was directly accross from us at the top of the cornfield above this tree line. it's speed of movement can only be disribed as, "as fast as you could zip the beam of a flashlight across a wall." very fast!!!
   it was, as i said, approx. 5ft in diameter. it glowed a soft turquoise blue. and it made zero noise. this part i'm kinda fuzzy on. it either turn orange, & then desended directly into the tree line! or it desended directly into the tree line & then turned orange. i can't remember which. either way, the only thing we've got that could desend like that? are helicopters. which the rotors would have been torn to pieces in the trees. or a harrier jump jet. which makes all kinds of noise. this object/craft was entirely silent! while on the ground it was orange. 
it stayed there for what seemed like maybe a minute, or two. 
while there it pulsed in a slowed ebbing constant rythmn. 
it then change colors back to the blue. i believe before returning back to the sky to it's old altitude.(no more than 150ft. it seemed like) & zipped directly back the way it came, every bit as fast as it had appeared. 
   i don't believe any of us experienced "lost time". none of us were afraid either during, or directly following the event.
   a very interesting sidebar! it left an indentation where it landed approx. 5ft. in diameter, & 3ft. or so deep. stupidly, we played in this indentation! made it our fort! it was not a "crater". no burn/scorch marks. more like the dirt had just been removed. 
   
sidebar #2: 
seperate from this event, my best friend told me years(3 or 4) after this that he'd seen a saucer above his house(across and a door down from my house.) when we were like 7, or 8.  the above event happened when we were approx. 10/11. he said he'd seen these lights through the curtains in their living roomwhen he gotten up to go to the bathroom, he looked out, and saw this craft floating above the street light at the end of his driveway. he ran to the front door to get a better look, only to not see it. he went outside to fine that it had moved above his house! he said he paniced, & run back in to his bed. he also said he'd had "nightmares" about them coming back to get him for year afterwards. it should also be noted that there was a strange blacken circle on the street directly in front of the very light he'd stated the craft was hovering over for years while we were growing up. 
   now the part that makes my skin go creepy. as a teen years after friend #1 had told me of his experience?(now age 15/16) my other friend and i were talking late one night. out of the blue, with no prompting,or mention from me, he brings up that he too had seen the craft that friend #1 had seen! apparently at the same time, on the same night! friend #2 stated he too had gotten up to go to the bathroom, and saw lights coming through his bathroom window. which faces friend #1's house. he then run to his kitchen, where he said he looked through these luever/shutter things they had on the inside of the kitchen windows. he told me he saw basically the same craft that friend #1 had described. a saucer with multi-colored strobing/flashing lights. friend #2 said he too paniced, & run back his bed. 
   so i had two seperate people, that i trust, tell me the same story from each of their own pov's, but they tell me this years apart! independent of each other. with the second not knowing what the first had told me until after he'd told his side of the story!
   i still know both these gentlemen. but they have families, and i seriously doubt that they'd be willing to step forward. however, i am 100% willing to take as many poly-graph tests as you want me to, to prove to you that everything that i've just re-counted to you did indeed happen to the best of my knowledge just as i described.
   please e-mail me a response as to if mufon has ever heard of an encounter like the one i described having in "the weeds" on april 2nd, around 8:30 pm. i really want to know if anybody else has seen what we all saw that night.
thank you for your time & consideration.

sincerely,
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Silent luminous sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed a large c shaped dark object that looked like a large boomerang or c shaped; cloud?, cloaked military craft?, ufo?, idk object, manifest then get hit by lightning in the sky over chicago. it was easter sunday 4/4/10. what's interesting is that a part of the lightning strike forms what i think looks like a cross and halo above a symbol of a man in the video recorded on easter sunday, but that's my opinion. the lightnings path is from north to south, goes up,(separates,disappears,is blocked?) and continues on a downward path out of frame. i personally believe the lightning was harnessed by 4d et craft using the earth's natural free energy but that is novice guess and again "only my opinion". thanks for letting me share my sighting mufon. fyi if you watch the video i translated my own perspective as to what i was recording in the comments of the youtube video b/c it seemed to me the ets knew they were being recorded and projected a message in the split second of the lightning's flash. -guttergawker
 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lue8ude4vkq
content.summary: Lightning strikes manta ray looking object?

content.detailedDescription: Hey, this event just happened. i went outside to try and catch our bird which flew out of its cage and into a tree. as soon as we got out i saw a huge light fall from the sky and it reached the ground before vanishing. i thought it was a meteor or something until i noticed another light in the distance. i thought it was a really bright star or something. about 5 minutes later i noticed that the light moved about 1cm to the left. i wasn't paying full attention to it as i was trying to get my bird down. finally about 15 minutes later, i saw the light has moved backwards. i decided to walk out the front to see it. when i got out the front the light was gone. it wasn't cloudy or anything.
content.summary: Massive meteor light falling then huge light in sky for 10 mintutes moving around.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15pm i stepped out to smoke, and looked up and from behind what was obscured by a large tree came two dark, orangish brown balls that were faintly lit.  they moved e-ne, slowly, over my house, and i lost sight of them.  as they came from behind the tree, one was behind the other, and then they shifted to side by side.
i perceived them to be very low, and though it may have been traffic, there was a whisping type sound. 
at first i thought it was perhaps an advertising light, but there are no car lots for many miles (40 i think) and no clouds either.   
there is a military zone not too far from here, in the same direction.
content.summary: Two dark orangish balls moving east over sunnyside, wa. yakima county

content.detailedDescription:
On october 7, 2005 my husband, 3 year old, and i were hiking in monument valley, ut.  it was a spectacular cloudless autumn day. my husband was taking pictures when we saw a shiny curved object in the sky. we both assumed it was a hanglider, but it seemed very high. we were trying to figure out where a glider would launch to be where it was. we watched it for a few minutes a bit puzzled, because it didn't move through the sky like a typical glider. this one went across and wasn't turning - a very odd motion for a glider. 

the object went across the sky, then became brighter - we thought it was turning and catching the sun's reflection. it suddently flashed bright, and was gone. we kept looking around, but didn't see anything.  we looked at each other, as if to confirm we actual saw something. we just kind of accepted it as an odd site, and my 3 year old kept asking 'where'd the glider go?'

i recently downloaded a picture disc, and came across our trip to monument valley. there were two photos with the shiny "hanglider" in it. the pictures show it to be sphere shaped, but we saw a shiny curve-like object.
content.summary: Shiny object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Stargazing on a very clear night - sighted 5 lights, yellow color, flashing on and off in random sequence. if one solid object, lights would have formed a massive boomerang shape. could not see any solid object between lights. object was moving slowly and silently in a slight bank. unable to ascertain distance, speed, or exact size but appeared to be very large. object was moving from the north. object vanished after about a minute (all lights went out). i have lived near airports all my life and am very acquainted with all aircraft - this was not any aircraft i have ever seen or heard of. seemed very similar to the phoenix lights.
content.summary: Lights sighted

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way home from kc from my mother in laws funeral and was turning down bb highway going east about 5 miles from 65 highway that is between the towns of warsaw and lincoln missouri. we were going east when we saw large bright object in the sky that was not a plane, not anything but a ufo. it was square, as silly as it sounds my husband thought it looked like a usa flag at first.  it was like just hovering there over the highway up ahead and then darted over to the left (north) husband said some red and blue and mostly yellow lights.  he told me to look (i was doing a text message at the time) and looked up and saw the very bright yellow lights and then saw it over the woods to the left (north).  keep looking but did not see it again.  got to a clearing but did not see it again.  i wanted to call the sheriff dept but husband said that they would think we were crazy.  i really wish i had not seen it.  back many years ago in the late 70's we saw one but it was more like a muffin pan....Made a report a couple years ago with your group.
1.  explained that
2.  the bright lights in the sky
3.  just did not know.....
4.  just kind of like floating there, lights extremely bright. started across to the left and just got off over the woods and did not see again.
5.  just shook up.  called son to tell him we got home ok and told him about it.  
6.  it just went off into/over the woods
content.summary: Big square with bright yellow lights around edges

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bulldozer on a waste dump at 1930 meter elevation looking eastwardly during my nightshift on april 10th, 2010, at a coal mine north of grande cache, the position i was in gave me a wide panorama of the rockies to my right and the foothills to my left. and noticed a red flashing light pass overhead from the northwest travelling southeast at 3:40 a.M.The morning of the 11th, i could not see any shape,only the red light that flashed brighter red intermitantly, it seemed to be going in a straight path, no noise, i asked on the two-way radio if anyone else saw the light, but none of my coworkers saw it. it only took a few minutes to cross the sky before i lost sight of it, it was dark but clear sky overhead
content.summary: Red flashing light moving from northwest to southeast

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my frend (we both saw the same thing) saw 3 lights very far away looking in the sky while we were at my girlfrends dads house, it is around 3 miles north east of given adress, i dont know if you want my address or adress of sighting, adress of sighting was on school road just passed flynn road on left heading east. they appeared as 3 lights or points with 2 closer together on the left ( middle one about 25 degrees of the way between them from left) and they were either all one craft moving extremely fast directly away from us or 3 seperate objects moving away in formation or 3 seperate objects getting closer together in the same ratio or respect or proximity to each other (looked like if you zoom out with a camera) and dimmer. then they disappeared. the first part you just read we saw for around 4 secondts. then they dissapeared. we jumped up on the back of a pickup truck to see farther over the tree line because they got closeish to the treeline when they dissapeared. and we saw nothing for around 3 seconds. then we saw one appear and then another appear then the first start to fade while another was appearing then the second 2 fully appeared just as the first faded out then the 2nd one started to fade as the 3rd was still bright and the 3rd fade just as the first two had before. it could have been 6 seperate objects because we saw 3 points in  2 defferent places but not at the same time, im just saying if they were 3 objects at our estimated distance they must have went out then accelorated incredibly fast  then decelorated so fast that nothing i can think of could have survived the g force involved. a person would be nothing but splat after a ride like that. 

ok as far as your "points"

we were stripping out a classic bmw to sell parts off of all day since around 11 am, we finished that for the day so we were just relaxing, dave (my girlfrend<autumn>)'s dad was selling a truck so we went outside to watch him haggle. and we saw em

we went stepping back towards the east as the other 3 people walked north west towards the house we saw it then jumped on the truck and then i said "holy s**t theres your ufo right there" the whole time from when i saw it to when i was on the back of the truck was around 8 seconds, then i saw it again then said that just as they dissapeared, the other 3 looked and it was too late so they were laughing at us because i was really serious when i said it so they must think im nuts, well the 2 people that were there to buy the truck sure did but mabey not autumns dad he might have believed me.

when i first saw the object it looked like a really bright but small sunset then i noticed the points

i think i covered the movements and actions

adrenalin rush and extreme extacy like it made me feel so happy to have actually saw something i have been so interested in for the first time. i have been researching and reading/watching about ufo's for years but i have never seen anything like what i just did, this is the first thing i have ever seen that i can not just explain to myself, like it was a miracle that god must have created, like something that just cant happen.

they slowly lighted and faded 1 at a time then we watched for 5 minutes after and never saw another thing.

ask me all the questions you want, we both will participate in whatever, you can interrogate us and criticise us and we will hold our story.

oh by the way, i havent plotted it on a map yet but there is a dopplar weather radar ball on the corner of c-38 and passenhiem road in the general direction we werre looking, but the ball is a bit farther than my distance estamet, help me with the geography and triginomitry.
content.summary: Lights 1500 feet elevation at 25 miles distance east south east hover, leave, dissapear, reapear, fade,

content.detailedDescription:
My coworker mentioned to me this last weekend that somewhere near the 6th or the 7th he was driving south on i-5 and noticed 4 vehicles pulled over on the east side of the freeway, watching something going on over a lake (unsure the name of the lake) between 272nd and 317th. 

he said he then saw a cylinder about 200' above the water, very bright lights flashing and they weren't red or green, which might indicate a known aircraft. he also said that the object seemed to be slowly rotating. i tried looking the event up and haven't found any reference to it, and with no other explination present, i'd call it a ufo. i told him this and he didn't want it called that lol. i explained that if he didn't know what it was, then it was unidentified, it was flying, and it was an object, and that it didn't nessisarily have anything to do with aliens.

unknown for most factors. i also do not know who the other witnesses were. merely reporting because it should be. i believe 99% of sighting have some sort of explination, and in the event that this particular one doesn't, than you've got some place to start or looking.


"p"
content.summary: Dark, cylinder with varied very bright flashing lights. it rotated.

content.detailedDescription:
My father was on a frigate heading back to port in 1951.  sometime during a calm and sunny afternoon one area in which they were traveling all of a sudden became very dark and the electrical power on board the ship shorted out and caused total blackness. my dad being hailed to the bridge noticed along with other ship mates  six glowing lights in the water on the port side of the ship. he stated the lights were about seven fathoms down and the captain also stated that that it could not possibly be coral which is sometimes seen below the surface. the objects were too cylindrical in shape also.  the story get a bit more interesting as he stated that with the total backout the men seemed to have amnesia during this experience. now the strangest of all is the fact that not only do they not remember but by the time they where hailed by canadian military port they were approximately 100 miles off due course of where they were supposed to be at the time.  they were also 2 days late as they were supposed to be in on a friday and had arrived of sunday..They did not even realize the two day difference//now that being said they were told never to speak of it to anyone  ever by the captain and some officals ,,,,now my dad is turning 80 soon and still to this day is embedded in his mind and proably those who served with him on this trip returning from the triangle.....


"s"
content.summary: Eerie event in bermuda triangle

content.detailedDescription:
It was the summer of 1987 approxiamtely and i was with my mom and sister visiting a friend of my mothers in celina tennessee. it was in the early evening and we were all outside the house i know there were several adults including my mother outside. we had decided to make icecream with an electric icecream maker and i knew i needed to go inside i was looking for a toy or something to play with. around 15 minutes had gone by and i remember my mom yelling at me to come out of the house, and i was walking across the yard and she was at the road with everyone else.. i remember getting up to them and looking at her and asking what she wanted when i noticed they were all looking up and as i did i saw this massive ship. i think city block or rather several city blocks would be the description. to give a good idea i use the relevance in size of a aircraft carrier ie 1000 feet long and 20 ~ 30 stories high... except it was one huge block, dark in complection... black or dark gray and had a millon windows lit up in white lights.. just like looking at  city building at night .. perhaps in chicago or any major city. the width was close to the same height or a little less. no noise what so ever emitted from it and the air was not blowing or so light that you couldnt notice it. the object was coming almost directly up the road ie when i walked down to it from the house it was on my left and was going between 1 and 5 mph ... i am guessing but i do remember i could have walked with this it was so slow. it was very close to the tree tops, guessing i would say the trees were a 100 feet and the ship would be half the height of the trees above or less. so 150 feet directly over my head, always thought about throwing a baseball at it... but then again.. was scared at the time if this was so powerful.. it would do what to retaliate possibly lol.  
ok so the object was within site of the house for 10 -15 minutes and it slowly disappeared into the center of the town. now back to the icecream, i remember the icecream very specifically because 30 min latter we needed salt for it... so we drove 1 - 2 miles down the road or less and stopped at a lil conveince store and the object was just leaving the baseball fields directly overhead where everyone had s topped to watch. there is a newspaper writeup where the army claimed this object was a baloon of some sort.. which is not even realisitc with the design of the object. i am in the navy and have never even seen or heard of anything like this and am trying to simply know if anyone has a copy of the article or knows of how to obtain it. 
as far as anything different in myself or my family i don't recount any or have ever seen another ufo again in my life. except for the occasional shooting star.
content.summary: Rectangular small city close to the size of a aircraft carrier

content.detailedDescription:
One evening i was listening to the local npr station. the host said that the iss would be visible that evening at about 10 pm in my area. so, i gathered some friends to watch for it with me. we saw what we assumed was the iss, but when it was almost overhead, a yellow object instantaneously accelerated away from it at a speed that appeared to be at least double what the speed of the iss was. the object took off in a direction of about 300 degrees normal to the path of the iss. i am very sure that the acceleration was instantaneous! the path of the iss was not altered as far as i could tell. i do not know if the object's path was flat or followed the earth's surface, but it was straight until it disappeared from view.

to answer #5, i wondered what the hell it was and thought that surely the astronauts knew about it. i figured i would never get an answer if i inquired about it.
content.summary: Object shot away from the international space station with instantaneous acceleration.

content.detailedDescription: New ufo over the van nuys ca sky seen by x17guy photog on 4-13-2010 at 2:20 pm at woodman & roscoe blvd.
content.summary: It was a sphere like ufo seen by me over my house.
